content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 0, Chelsea 4.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 0, Chelsea 4.
Peter Crouch (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Peter Crouch (Stoke City).
Attempt missed. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by N'Golo Kanté.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Goal!  Stoke City 0, Chelsea 4. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt missed. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (Stoke City) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ramadan Sobhi.
Foul by Victor Moses (Chelsea).
Peter Crouch (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right misses to the left. Assisted by Victor Moses.
Goal!  Stoke City 0, Chelsea 3. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko.
Substitution, Stoke City. Ibrahim Afellay replaces Bruno Martins Indi.
Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).
Glen Johnson (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (Stoke City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Xherdan Shaqiri with a cross.
Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Eden Hazard replaces Willian.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Darren Fletcher following a set piece situation.
Glen Johnson (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Offside, Chelsea. Thibaut Courtois tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Substitution, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas replaces Pedro.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Thibaut Courtois (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Tiemoué Bakayoko.
Attempt missed. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (Stoke City) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Peter Crouch with a headed pass.
Substitution, Stoke City. Peter Crouch replaces Jesé.
Attempt saved. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Bruno Martins Indi.
Hand ball by N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Gary Cahill replaces Marcos Alonso.
N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Ramadan Sobhi (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. Joe Allen (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Joe Allen (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a set piece situation.
Foul by Marcos Alonso (Chelsea).
Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Joe Allen (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcos Alonso (Chelsea).
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card.
Andreas Christensen (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City).
Second Half begins Stoke City 0, Chelsea 2.
First Half ends, Stoke City 0, Chelsea 2.
Attempt missed. Joe Allen (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Joe Allen with a cross.

Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).

Goal!  Stoke City 0, Chelsea 2. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.

First Half begins.
